title: 3rd CodeX Inter-SHS Programming Workshop
description: March 16 & 23, April 6, 2024 - Mapúa MCL ACM Student Chapter held every Saturday for three consecutive weeks the 3rd CodeX Inter-SHS Workshop. This workshop aimed to equip participants with basic Java syntax and programming problem-solving skills while familiarizing them with the competition platform. The activity featured a 2-hour and 30-minute mentoring session focused on Java programming concepts, followed by a 1-hour and 30-minute programming session where participants practiced these concepts and explored the competition platform in preparation for the upcoming 3rd CodeX Inter-SHS Programming Competition.
summary: Mapúa MCL ACM Student Chapter’s CodeX workshop was designed to teach basic Java concepts and prepare participants for the CodeX Inter-SHS Programming Competition.
